item.title: Spring Boot Actuator
item.description: Part V. Spring Boot Actuator 通过 Spring Boot Actuator 可以使用 HTTP endpoints 或 JMX 监控和管理应用程序。Auditing（审计）, health（健康状况）, and metrics gathering（metrics收集）都可以被应用于应用程序。 50 开启Actuator 添加maven依赖 1 2 3 4 5 6 <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-actuator</artifactId> </dependency> </dependencies> Definition of Actuator An actuator is a manufacturing term that refers to a mechanical device for moving or controlling something.
